<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Represents a range of memset&#39;d bytes with the ByteVal value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This allows us to analyze stores like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   store 0 -&gt; P+1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   store 0 -&gt; P+0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   store 0 -&gt; P+3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   store 0 -&gt; P+2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which sometimes happens with stores to arrays of structs etc.  When we see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the first store, we make a range &#91;1, 2).  The second store extends the range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to &#91;0, 2).  The third makes a new range &#91;2, 3).  The fourth store joins the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// two ranges into &#91;0, 3) which is memset&#39;able.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange">MemsetRange</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start/End - A semi range that describes the span that this range covers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The range is closed at the start and open at the end: &#91;Start, End).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a1827a631b19dc28ab5b92cce3049feb7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a08bd5a766fda4d1f159d192a3b19a9f9">Start</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a1827a631b19dc28ab5b92cce3049feb7">End</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// StartPtr - The getelementptr instruction that points to the start of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a7639d343402e983c8af69e41bc09349f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a7639d343402e983c8af69e41bc09349f">StartPtr</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Alignment - The known alignment of the first store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#aadc57e236fba009606938fa47c46d5a1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#aadc57e236fba009606938fa47c46d5a1">Alignment</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// TheStores - The actual stores that make up this range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Instruction &#42;, 16&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#aecce23689d355fbd5be9131c29954b5d">isProfitableToUseMemset</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#aecce23689d355fbd5be9131c29954b5d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#aecce23689d355fbd5be9131c29954b5d">MemsetRange::isProfitableToUseMemset</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we found more than 4 stores to merge or 16 bytes, use memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>.size() &gt;= 4 || <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a1827a631b19dc28ab5b92cce3049feb7">End</a> - <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a08bd5a766fda4d1f159d192a3b19a9f9">Start</a> &gt;= 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is nothing to merge, don&#39;t do anything.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>.size() &lt; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If any of the stores are a memset, then it is always good to extend the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that the code generator is capable of merging pairs of stores</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// together if it wants to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>.size() == 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we have fewer than 8 stores, it can still be worthwhile to do this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, merging 4 i8 stores into an i32 store is useful almost always.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, merging 2 32-bit stores isn&#39;t useful on a 32-bit architecture (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memset will be split into 2 32-bit stores anyway) and doing so can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// pessimize the llvm optimizer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we don&#39;t have perfect knowledge here, make some assumptions: assume</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the maximum GPR width is the same size as the largest legal integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size. If so, check to see whether we will end up actually reducing the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of stores used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bytes = unsigned(<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a1827a631b19dc28ab5b92cce3049feb7">End</a> - <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a08bd5a766fda4d1f159d192a3b19a9f9">Start</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxIntSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getLargestLegalIntTypeSizeInBits() / 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MaxIntSize == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxIntSize = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPointerStores = Bytes / MaxIntSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume the remaining bytes if any are done a byte at a time.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumByteStores = Bytes % MaxIntSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we will reduce the # stores (according to this heuristic), do the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation.  This encourages merging 4 x i8 -&gt; i32 and 2 x i16 -&gt; i32</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange/#a4a44fbe3e85f7b6e0b35472360721223">TheStores</a>.size() &gt; NumPointerStores + NumByteStores;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#a9bc7ad24e4fc25f232f96acf8cc235a8">MemsetRanges</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">range&#95;iterator = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl/#ac5b936169badf0b703567eb960278648">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MemsetRange&gt;::iterator</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// A sorted list of the memset ranges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MemsetRange, 8&gt;</a> Ranges;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;StoreInst&gt;</a>(Inst))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#a6fcde5e51e1d94eb58c4e4b5b10b90f7">addMemSet</a>(OffsetFromFirst, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MemSetInst&gt;</a>(Inst));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#aa8fa6e6b269b75ce442434704398c792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#aa8fa6e6b269b75ce442434704398c792">addStore</a>(int64&#95;t OffsetFromFirst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> StoreSize = DL.getTypeStoreSize(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getOperand(0)-&gt;getType());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!StoreSize.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a9188f84e1dd67530330dcab9cae787d7">isScalable</a>() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can&#39;t track scalable-typed stores&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#a538047e21679cd2bf4cfd1e73fe022aa">addRange</a>(OffsetFromFirst, StoreSize.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a33880aaca0ad05e5f1557f079305bde5">getFixedValue</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">             <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getPointerOperand(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>-&gt;getAlign(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#a6fcde5e51e1d94eb58c4e4b5b10b90f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#a6fcde5e51e1d94eb58c4e4b5b10b90f7">addMemSet</a>(int64&#95;t OffsetFromFirst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memsetinst">MemSetInst</a> &#42;MSI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(MSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>())-&gt;getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#a538047e21679cd2bf4cfd1e73fe022aa">addRange</a>(OffsetFromFirst, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, MSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a">getDest</a>(), MSI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#ac03b57021568dcc4d9a685c40011ff09">getDestAlign</a>(), MSI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/metadata-cpp/#a538047e21679cd2bf4cfd1e73fe022aa">addRange</a>(int64&#95;t Start, int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> Alignment,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end anonymous namespace</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Add a new store to the MemsetRanges data structure.  This adds a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// new range for the specified store at the specified offset, merging into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// existing ranges as appropriate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#aa71b518026ce2113a8281f7dd3f050d9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetranges/#aa71b518026ce2113a8281f7dd3f050d9">MemsetRanges::addRange</a>(int64&#95;t Start, int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign">MaybeAlign</a> Alignment, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t End = Start + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  range&#95;iterator <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a327a399b9f6ef414a29ddeffba934d26">partition&#95;point</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Ranges, &#91;=&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange">MemsetRange</a> &amp;O) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> O.End &lt; Start; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We now know that I == E, in which case we didn&#39;t find anything to merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with, or that Start &lt;= I-&gt;End.  If End &lt; I-&gt;Start or I == E, then we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to insert a new range.  Handle this now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == Ranges.end() || End &lt; I-&gt;Start) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange">MemsetRange</a> &amp;R = &#42;Ranges.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-memcpyoptimizer-cpp-/memsetrange">MemsetRange</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R.Start = Start;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R.End = End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R.StartPtr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R.Alignment = Alignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R.TheStores.push&#95;back(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This store overlaps with I, add it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;TheStores.push&#95;back(Inst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, we may have an interval that completely contains our store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If so, just add it to the interval and return.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Start &lt;= Start &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;End &gt;= End)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we know that Start &lt;= I-&gt;End and End &gt;= I-&gt;Start so the range overlaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// but is not entirely contained within the range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See if the range extends the start of the range.  In this case, it couldn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possibly cause it to join the prior range, because otherwise we would have</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// stopped on &#42;it&#42;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Start &lt; I-&gt;Start) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Start = Start;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;StartPtr = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;Alignment = Alignment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now we know that Start &lt;= I-&gt;End and Start &gt;= I-&gt;Start (so the startpoint</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is in or right at the end of I), and that End &gt;= I-&gt;Start.  Extend I out to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// End.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (End &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;End) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;End = End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    range&#95;iterator NextI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (++NextI != Ranges.end() &amp;&amp; End &gt;= NextI-&gt;Start) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Merge the range in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;TheStores.append(NextI-&gt;TheStores.begin(), NextI-&gt;TheStores.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NextI-&gt;End &gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;End)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;End = NextI-&gt;End;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Ranges.erase(NextI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NextI = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                         MemCpyOptLegacyPass Pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur between Start and End.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Function can&#39;t unwind, so it also can&#39;t be visible through unwinding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Start-&gt;getFunction()-&gt;doesNotThrow())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Object is not visible on unwind.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for mod of Loc between Start and End, excluding both boundaries.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start and End can be in different blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319" lineLink="#ab06d3147949b764919b5ad90014afdfd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#ab06d3147949b764919b5ad90014afdfd">writtenBetween</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryssa">MemorySSA</a> &#42;MSSA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The general transformation to keep in mind is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @func(..., src, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memcpy(dest, src, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memcpy(dest, src, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   call @func(..., dest, ...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since moving the memcpy is technically awkward, we additionally check that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// src only holds uninitialized values at the moment of the call, meaning that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the memcpy can be discarded rather than moved.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we need to move a lifetime.start above the call, make sure that we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually do so. If the argument is bitcasted for example, we would have to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (SkippedLifetimeStart) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LifetimeArg &amp;&amp; LifetimeArg-&gt;getParent() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;getParent() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that storing to the first srcSize bytes of dest will not cause a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that nothing can observe cpyDest being written early. There are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a number of cases to consider:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  1 cpyDest cannot be accessed between C and cpyStore as a precondition of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     the transform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  2 C itself may not access cpyDest (prior to the transform). This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     checked further below.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  3 If cpyDest is accessible to the caller of this function (potentially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     captured and not based on an alloca), we need to ensure that we cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     unwind between C and cpyStore. This is checked here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  4 If cpyDest is potentially captured, there may be accesses to it from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     another thread. In this case, we need to check that cpyStore is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     guaranteed to be executed if C is. As it is a non-atomic access, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     renders accesses from other threads undefined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     TODO: This is currently not checked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0c90ca0636305936b0f39e94b9702ec7">mayBeVisibleThroughUnwinding</a>(cpyDest, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>, cpyStore)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Call Slot: Dest may be visible through unwinding\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that dest points to memory that is at least as aligned as src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> srcAlign = srcAlloca-&gt;getAlign();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isDestSufficientlyAligned = srcAlign &lt;= cpyDestAlign;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If dest is not aligned enough and we can&#39;t increase its alignment then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!isDestSufficientlyAligned &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;AllocaInst&gt;</a>(cpyDest)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Call Slot: Dest not sufficiently aligned\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that src is not accessed except via the call and the memcpy.  This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// guarantees that it holds only undefined values when passed in (so the final</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memcpy can be dropped), that it is not read or written between the call and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the memcpy, and that writing beyond the end of it is undefined.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a39d3d23a084c4544ee5903203db10e8a">append&#95;range</a>(srcUseList, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea4c614360da93c0a041b22e537de151eb">U</a>-&gt;users());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether src is captured by the called function, in which case there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may be further indirect uses of src.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcIsCaptured = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;args(), &#91;&amp;&#93;(Use &amp;U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !C-&gt;doesNotCapture(C-&gt;getArgOperandNo(&amp;U));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If src is captured, then check whether there are any potential uses of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// src through the captured pointer before the lifetime of src ends, either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// due to a lifetime.end or a return from the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcIsCaptured) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that dest is not captured before/at the call. We have already</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checked that src is not captured before it. If either had been captured,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then the call might be comparing the argument against the captured dest</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;DestObj = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3b1c5788b85ffa254be0e834edf5cf8f">getUnderlyingObject</a>(cpyDest);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lifetime of srcAlloca ends at lifetime.end.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We&#39;ve found that the (upward scanning) memory dependence of memcpy &#39;M&#39; is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the memcpy &#39;MDep&#39;. Try to simplify M to copy from MDep&#39;s input if we can.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::processMemCpyMemCpyDependence(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memcpyinst">MemCpyInst</a> &#42;M,</span></CodeLine>
