<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If dep instruction is reading from our current input, then it is a noop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transfer and substituting the input won&#39;t change this instruction. Just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ignore the input and let someone else zap MDep. This handles cases like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(a &lt;- a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(b &lt;- a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource() == MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferbase/#aaebde92913b64b73fa77dd6e8767d9d9">getSource</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only optimize non-volatile memcpy&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsic/#ada78af22b202d8b7d9fe772c2c9476ce">isVolatile</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><span class="doxyHighlight">  int64&#95;t MForwardOffset = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DataLayout &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getModule()-&gt;getDataLayout();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only transforms memcpy&#39;s where the dest of one is the source of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other, or they have an offset in a range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource() != MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a">getDest</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource()-&gt;getPointerOffsetFrom(MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a">getDest</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> || &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MForwardOffset = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The length of the memcpy&#39;s must be the same, or the preceding one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be larger than the following one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MForwardOffset != 0 || MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getLength()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MDepLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MLen = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getLength());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MDepLen || !MLen ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MDepLen-&gt;getZExtValue() &lt; MLen-&gt;getZExtValue() + MForwardOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa241826e10b4a9bf77c3115e7160d3c7">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;CopySource = MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferbase/#aaebde92913b64b73fa77dd6e8767d9d9">getSource</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;NewCopySource = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CleanupOnRet = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1af45c4dc83c083c5ae914d96fd3ce96">llvm::make&#95;scope&#95;exit</a>(&#91;&amp;&#93; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewCopySource &amp;&amp; NewCopySource-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a9d7de807ebdfe1819df3ff6cb0f16158">use&#95;empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Safety: It&#39;s safe here because we will only allocate more instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// after finishing all BatchAA queries, but we have to be careful if we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to do something like this in another place. Then we&#39;d probably</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have to delay instruction removal until all transforms on an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction finished.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">      eraseInstruction(NewCopySource);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MaybeAlign CopySourceAlign = MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferbase/#aa512958c35cfdd696c21623a964fc2d9">getSourceAlign</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We just need to calculate the actual size of the copy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCopyLoc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a207e239d68b66b0d5ccad5997a5ef027">MemoryLocation::getForSource</a>(MDep).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a078f7dbb4fe93a1a5921d82a91f04875">getWithNewSize</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a207e239d68b66b0d5ccad5997a5ef027">MemoryLocation::getForSource</a>(M).<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When the forwarding offset is greater than 0, we transform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(d1 &lt;- s1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(d2 &lt;- d1+o)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(d2 &lt;- s1+o)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MForwardOffset &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The copy destination of &#96;M&#96; maybe can serve as the source of copying.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::optional&lt;int64&#95;t&gt; MDestOffset =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getRawDest()-&gt;getPointerOffsetFrom(MDep-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferbase/#aa3c771310b66362b6a032071f63776bb">getRawSource</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MDestOffset == MForwardOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CopySource = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDest();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CopySource = Builder.CreateInBoundsPtrAdd(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">          CopySource, Builder.getInt64(MForwardOffset));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      NewCopySource = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Instruction&gt;</a>(CopySource);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to update &#96;MCopyLoc&#96; if an offset exists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MCopyLoc = MCopyLoc.getWithNewPtr(CopySource);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CopySourceAlign)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CopySourceAlign = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(&#42;CopySourceAlign, MForwardOffset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid infinite loops</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#ab9ba3a606a0299b684755f56b1d2f1c7">isMustAlias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource(), CopySource))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Verify that the copied-from memory doesn&#39;t change in between the two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transfers.  For example, in:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(a &lt;- b)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#42;b = 42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    memcpy(c &lt;- a)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It would be invalid to transform the second memcpy into memcpy(c &lt;- b).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: If the code between M and MDep is transparent to the destination &quot;c&quot;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we could still perform the xform by moving M up to the first memcpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#ab06d3147949b764919b5ad90014afdfd">writtenBetween</a>(MSSA, BAA, MCopyLoc, MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(MDep),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(M)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to create &#96;memcpy(a &lt;- a)&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#ab9ba3a606a0299b684755f56b1d2f1c7">isMustAlias</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDest(), CopySource)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the instruction we&#39;re replacing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    eraseInstruction(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumMemCpyInstr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the dest of the second might alias the source of the first, then the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// source and dest might overlap. In addition, if the source of the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// points to constant memory, they won&#39;t overlap by definition. Otherwise, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// still want to eliminate the intermediate value, but we have to generate a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memmove instead of memcpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseMemMove = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a728f79528ca8659e15d00c1e6818b316">isModSet</a>(BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#adfa0be41805b25d9577d6f15d148a0d7">getModRefInfo</a>(M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a207e239d68b66b0d5ccad5997a5ef027">MemoryLocation::getForSource</a>(MDep)))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t convert llvm.memcpy.inline into memmove because memmove can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lowered as a call, and that is not allowed for llvm.memcpy.inline (and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// there is no inline version of llvm.memmove)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;MemCpyInlineInst&gt;</a>(M))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><span class="doxyHighlight">    UseMemMove = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all checks passed, then we can transform M.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;MemCpyOptPass: Forwarding memcpy-&gt;memcpy src:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;MDep &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;M &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Is this worth it if we&#39;re creating a less aligned memcpy? For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// example we could be moving from movaps -&gt; movq on x86.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;NewM;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              CopySourceAlign, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getLength(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;isVolatile());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;MemCpyInlineInst&gt;</a>(M)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// llvm.memcpy may be promoted to llvm.memcpy.inline, but the converse is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// never allowed since that would allow the latter to be lowered as a call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to an external function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewM = Builder.CreateMemCpyInline(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDest(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDestAlign(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NewM =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.CreateMemCpy(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDest(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDestAlign(), CopySource,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NewM-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#aec6eaa1e49f48c178e0ab9c030b5971e">copyMetadata</a>(&#42;M, LLVMContext::MD&#95;DIAssignID);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;MemoryDef&gt;</a>(MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(M)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LastDef = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MemoryDef&gt;</a>(MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(M));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;NewAccess = MSSAU-&gt;createMemoryAccessAfter(NewM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, LastDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MSSAU-&gt;insertDef(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MemoryDef&gt;</a>(NewAccess), </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;RenameUses=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the instruction we&#39;re replacing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  eraseInstruction(M);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumMemCpyInstr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// We&#39;ve found that the (upward scanning) memory dependence of \\p MemCpy is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p MemSet.  Try to simplify \\p MemSet to only set the trailing bytes that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// weren&#39;t copied over by \\p MemCpy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In other words, transform:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memset(dst, c, dst&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memcpy(dst, src, src&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memset(dst + src&#95;size, c, dst&#95;size &lt;= src&#95;size ? 0 : dst&#95;size - src&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memcpy(dst, src, src&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The memset is sunk to just before the memcpy to ensure that src&#95;size is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// present when emitting the simplified memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::processMemSetMemCpyDependence(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memcpyinst">MemCpyInst</a> &#42;MemCpy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memsetinst">MemSetInst</a> &#42;MemSet,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a> &amp;BAA) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only transform memset/memcpy with the same destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#ab9ba3a606a0299b684755f56b1d2f1c7">isMustAlias</a>(MemSet-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a">getDest</a>(), MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a44f399ae5b08171d0b9886d0a27a582a">getDest</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t perform the transform if src&#95;size may be zero. In that case, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transform is essentially a complex no-op and may lead to an infinite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop if BasicAA is smart enough to understand that dst and dst + src&#95;size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are still MustAlias after the transform.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;SrcSize = MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9893e3e4b14f8fa15d7c3c25a6a0b6f6">isKnownNonZero</a>(SrcSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      SimplifyQuery(MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#af65afd02332c4f21c2fab7d217d6600f">getDataLayout</a>(), DT, AC, MemCpy)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that src and dst of the memcpy aren&#39;t the same. While memcpy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operands cannot partially overlap, exact equality is allowed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a728f79528ca8659e15d00c1e6818b316">isModSet</a>(BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#adfa0be41805b25d9577d6f15d148a0d7">getModRefInfo</a>(MemCpy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#a207e239d68b66b0d5ccad5997a5ef027">MemoryLocation::getForSource</a>(MemCpy))))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We know that dst up to src&#95;size is not written. We now need to make sure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that dst up to dst&#95;size is not accessed. (If we did not move the memset,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// checking for reads would be sufficient.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a732b03e0a47de172531cbae6e0ae0193">accessedBetween</a>(BAA, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorylocation/#ac8f8983c6b76d0e30f22fff86b281f16">MemoryLocation::getForDest</a>(MemSet),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(MemSet),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      MSSA-&gt;getMemoryAccess(MemCpy)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the same i8&#42; dest as the memcpy, killing the memset dest if different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;Dest = MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a18d6accbeb5cb7b8051219b8b4ddd4f7">getRawDest</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;DestSize = MemSet-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a0c90ca0636305936b0f39e94b9702ec7">mayBeVisibleThroughUnwinding</a>(Dest, MemSet, MemCpy))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the sizes are the same, simply drop the memset instead of generating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a replacement with zero size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DestSize == SrcSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><span class="doxyHighlight">    eraseInstruction(MemSet);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By default, create an unaligned memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> Alignment = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Dest is aligned, and SrcSize is constant, use the minimum alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the sum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/arg/key/#a6b334a5f83504ebc99cc59f4f333ff98">Align</a> DestAlign = std::max(MemSet-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#ac03b57021568dcc4d9a685c40011ff09">getDestAlign</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign/#a06846474be3ab85f8d30c388faf3b116">valueOrOne</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#ac03b57021568dcc4d9a685c40011ff09">getDestAlign</a>().<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/maybealign/#a06846474be3ab85f8d30c388faf3b116">valueOrOne</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Transform memcpy to memset when its source was just memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In other words, turn:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memset(dst1, c, dst1&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memcpy(dst2, dst1, dst2&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memset(dst1, c, dst1&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   memset(dst2, c, dst2&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// When dst2&#95;size &lt;= dst1&#95;size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::performMemCpyToMemSetOptzn(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memcpyinst">MemCpyInst</a> &#42;MemCpy,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memsetinst">MemSetInst</a> &#42;MemSet,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a> &amp;BAA) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that memcpy(..., memset(...), ...), that is we are memsetting and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// memcpying from the same address. Otherwise it is hard to reason about.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BAA.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults/#ab9ba3a606a0299b684755f56b1d2f1c7">isMustAlias</a>(MemSet-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a18d6accbeb5cb7b8051219b8b4ddd4f7">getRawDest</a>(), MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memtransferbase/#aa3c771310b66362b6a032071f63776bb">getRawSource</a>()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a066e2a31a13d6520e52ae1944f194662">Value</a> &#42;CopySize = MemCpy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memintrinsicbase/#a0fef04103987e9763468d19eb680b223">getLength</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the memcpy doesn&#39;t read any more than what the memset wrote.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempts to optimize the pattern whereby memory is copied from an alloca to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// another alloca, where the two allocas don&#39;t have conflicting mod/ref. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// successful, the two allocas can be merged into one and the transfer can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// deleted. This pattern is generated frequently in Rust, due to the ubiquity of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// move operations in that language.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Once we determine that the optimization is safe to perform, we replace all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// uses of the destination alloca with the source alloca. We also &quot;shrink wrap&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the lifetime markers of the single merged alloca to before the first use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and after the last use. Note that the &quot;shrink wrapping&quot; procedure is a safe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transformation only because we restrict the scope of this optimization to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allocas that aren&#39;t captured.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::performStackMoveOptzn(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Load, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Store,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;DestAlloca,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;SrcAlloca, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typesize">TypeSize</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/batchaaresults">BatchAAResults</a> &amp;BAA) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stack Move: Attempting to optimize:\\n&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    &lt;&lt; &#42;Store &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure the two allocas are in the same address space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SrcAlloca-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst/#ad2fb148dfac3182fce33be95fc4e9159">getAddressSpace</a>() != DestAlloca-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst/#ad2fb148dfac3182fce33be95fc4e9159">getAddressSpace</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Stack Move: Address space mismatch\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Perform simplification of memcpy&#39;s.  If we have memcpy A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// which copies X to Y, and memcpy B which copies Y to Z, then we can rewrite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// B to be a memcpy from X to Z (or potentially a memmove, depending on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// circumstances). This allows later passes to remove the first memcpy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// altogether.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::processMemCpy(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memcpyinst">MemCpyInst</a> &#42;M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a98c0a84a5dfa8bce341c829709f171e5">BasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;BBI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only optimize non-volatile memcpy&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;isVolatile())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the source and destination of the memcpy are the same, then zap it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getSource() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm/#ac2456158e5acb44477d8ecfa2d04dbdea69691c7bdcc3ce6d5d8a1361f22d04ac">M</a>-&gt;getDest()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MA)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to turn a partially redundant memset + memcpy into</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1764"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The memcpy must post-dom the memset, so limit this to the same basic</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1774"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are five possible optimizations we can do for memcpy:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1776"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   a) memcpy-memcpy xform which exposes redundance for DSE.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   b) call-memcpy xform for return slot optimization.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c) memcpy from freshly alloca&#39;d space or space that has just started</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      its lifetime copies undefined data, and we can therefore eliminate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      the memcpy in favor of the data that was already at the destination.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   d) memcpy from a just-memset&#39;d source can be turned into memset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   e) elimination of memcpy via stack-move optimization.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1999"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2000"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2001"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is called on memcpy dest pointer arguments attributed as immutable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2002"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// during call. Try to use memcpy source directly if all of the following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2003"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// conditions are satisfied.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2004"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 The memcpy dst is neither modified during the call nor captured by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2005"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2006"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 The memcpy dst is an alloca with known alignment &amp; size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2007"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     2-1. The memcpy length == the alloca size which ensures that the new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2008"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     pointer is dereferenceable for the required range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2009"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     2-2. The src pointer has alignment &gt;= the alloca alignment or can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2010"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     enforced so.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2011"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 The memcpy dst and src is not modified between the memcpy and the call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2012"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (if MSSA clobber check is safe.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2013"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4 The memcpy src is not modified during the call. (ModRef check shows no</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2014"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Mod.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MemCpyOptPass::processImmutArgument(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ArgNo) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BatchAAResults BAA(&#42;AA, EEA);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase/#a27ab264aa1e655ed42732fe0ec40d441">doesNotCapture</a>(ArgNo))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 Check that arg is alloca</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Even if the arg gets back to branches, we can remove memcpy if all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the alloca alignments can be enforced to source alignment.</span></CodeLine>
